title: Implement pattern analyzer for setup workflows
description: Create analyzer that detects patterns in template usage, task breakdown strategies, and project setup workflows. Identify opportunities for new templates or workflow optimizations based on recurring patterns.
notes: Enables system learning and improvement. Created comprehensive Python analyzer with pattern detection for templates, tasks, assumptions, and workflows.
completion_notes: Implemented pattern_analyzer.py with comprehensive analysis capabilities including template usage tracking, task breakdown pattern detection, assumption failure analysis, workflow efficiency metrics, and emerging pattern detection. Created analyze-patterns.md command for easy execution. The analyzer generates actionable recommendations and can update pattern-detection.md automatically.
